levelQuestions.content: How did the COVID-19 pandemic impact food security in South Africa in 2020?

answers.content: Almost 23.6% experienced moderate to severe food insecurity

levelQuestions.content: What is the main goal of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 2 (SDG 2) related to food security by 2030?
Which population group in South Africa was least affected by moderate to severe food insecurity in 2019?
What is the impact of unemployment on household food security in South Africa?

answers.content: Unemployment has no effect on food security
Unemployment contributes to loss of livelihoods and income

levelQuestions.content: How did household engagement in agricultural activities change between 2017 and 2020 in South Africa?

answers.content: There was no change in household engagement
A decline in the proportion of households involved in agriculture
A significant increase in agricultural activities

levelQuestions.content: How many South African households reported experiencing hunger in 2021?
What percentage of households with children aged five or younger reported experiencing hunger in 2021?
What proportion of households were involved in agricultural activities in South Africa in 2021?
How does employment status relate to household hunger in South Africa?

answers.content: No correlation between employment and hunger
Hunger is higher in households without an employed member
Hunger is higher in households with an employed member
